Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Artificial intelligence at American - American Airlines Newsroom
relevantSources.summary: Details American's AI approach built on governance foundation ensuring safe, secure responsible use.

relevantSources.title: American Airlines Platform terms and conditions − Support
relevantSources.summary: Outlines AI Tool usage terms requiring appropriate permissible inputs from users.

Transparency.findings: American Airlines publicly describes its AI governance framework and responsible use principles, highlighting a commitment to transparency in AI deployment. Their terms and conditions further clarify user responsibilities and permissible AI tool usage.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 1 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: ESG REPORT 2021 American Airlines
relevantSources.summary: Documents hiring technology platform using AI-driven solutions to ensure accountability and mitigate potential hiring bias.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: The 2021 ESG Report provides concrete evidence that American Airlines employs AI-driven solutions in its hiring platform to address and mitigate potential bias. This demonstrates a tangible commitment to fairness and bias mitigation in at least one critical business process.

Explainability.justification: Score = 0 because none of the researched sources address Explainability in any meaningful way.
Explainability.findings: No public evidence found for this pillar.

Human Oversight & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Artificial intelligence at American - American Airlines Newsroom
relevantSources.summary: States AI technology focuses on strengthening human decision making, not replacing it.

relevantSources.title: Standards of Business Conduct - American Airlines
relevantSources.summary: Outlines ethics office and reporting mechanisms for business conduct compliance.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: American Airlines’ public statements emphasize a human-centered approach to AI, with technology designed to support—not replace—human decision-making. The company also provides clear reporting and accountability mechanisms through its business conduct standards.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: American Airlines Platform terms and conditions − Support
relevantSources.summary: Contains AI tool usage terms addressing data security and appropriate content requirements.

relevantSources.title: AA Health and Welfare Plan for Active Employees - 2016 SPD
relevantSources.summary: Details PHI disclosure policies and data protection measures for health information.

Privacy & Security.findings: American Airlines outlines its data security and privacy protocols in public-facing documents, including specific requirements for AI tool usage and the protection of sensitive health information. These sources demonstrate a clear commitment to privacy and security.

Governance & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Artificial intelligence at American - American Airlines Newsroom
relevantSources.summary: Describes centralized Gen AI management approach with established governance framework.

relevantSources.title: ESG REPORT 2021 American Airlines
relevantSources.summary: Details ESG commitments and corporate governance structure including transparency reporting.

relevantSources.title: Standards of Business Conduct - American Airlines
relevantSources.summary: Establishes business ethics compliance office and accountability mechanisms for responsible conduct.

Governance & Accountability.findings: Multiple sources confirm that American Airlines has a formal AI governance structure, including centralized management, ESG reporting, and a business conduct office. These frameworks support accountability and oversight for responsible AI practices.

Public Commitments & External Audits.justification: Score = 0.5 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain only high-level principle statements.

relevantSources.title: ASAPP X American Airlines Case Study
relevantSources.summary: Documents American's partnership with ASAPP for AI-powered customer service platform implementation.

relevantSources.title: American Airlines and Microsoft partner for better travel experiences
relevantSources.summary: Details Microsoft Azure partnership leveraging AI and data analytics for travel optimization.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: American Airlines has made public commitments to AI innovation through partnerships with external technology providers. However, there is no evidence of third-party audits, certifications, or signatory status to external AI ethics frameworks.

summary.overallFindings: American Airlines demonstrates strong commitments to transparency, fairness, human oversight, privacy, and governance in its AI practices, with clear documentation and frameworks for responsible AI use. However, the company lacks public evidence regarding AI explainability and has only made high-level commitments regarding external audits and public partnerships, rather than concrete certifications or signatory status to AI ethics standards.
